product_name: REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Long Underwear Bottoms - Men's
long_description: Working up a sweat in cold weather? The men's REI Midweight Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) long underwear bottoms move moisture away from your skin and dry quickly so you can stay and play longer. Polartec Power Dry utilizes 2 different yarns on either side of the fabric to enhance comfort: interior yarn wicks moisture, and exterior yarn dries quickly. The combination of the 2 yarns helps keep you dry during highly aerobic activities because it moves moisture away from skin faster than single-component fabrics such as cotton. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Brushed elastic waistband ensures a comfortable fit. Fabric offers a UPF rating of 20 to protect against harmful UV light. The men's REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry long underwear bottoms feature a next-to-skin fit that hugs the body.
